Synopsis:
A group of five tough boys who share a passion for football, 
try to make things more exciting by placing small wagers with 
each other on games. Soon they are running some smalltime scams 
and eventually they wind up involved with one of the most powerful 
gambling rings in Bangkok. When one of them accidently forgets to 
turn in his bets, they fall into a dangerous scam to trick the bookie. 
When greed and jealousy start to rip the group apart, the boys act 
foolishly and draw attention to their scam. If they are discovered, 
there won&#039;t be anywhere that they can hide.
